question.content: It will be next to impossible to ………a room at the Ashton Hotel this week because of the film festival.
The presentation of this evening’s winners will commence ………at seven following dinner at six.
The new sports complex will accommodate an Olympic-sized swimming pool and other ………, including a fitness center and a spa, to name just a few.
Our new product will be put through a number of ………tests before being released to the public.
Mr. Chan’s main role in the company for the next two weeks is to look ………the right person to take over Mr. Shaw’s position when he leaves at the end of the month.
People unanimously agreed that John would have performed a great deal better under more ……… circumstances.
After a long and difficult strike, the plant workers will show up to work ……… Monday.
Scarborough General Hospital has two ……… for certified X-ray technicians to start immediately.
Mark’s Warehouse Clearance Store is having a sale with saving of up to 40 percent off on all clothing this weekend ……… celebration of its 25th anniversary.
Probe Magazine conducted a survey asking one thousand employees who work in low-paying industries to express ………their biggest concerns are.
